price: Rabbiin gabroota Isaatiif akkaan rahmata godhaNama fedhes ni sooraInni jabaa injifataadha.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفُۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرۡزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡقَوِيُّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu laṭīfun biʿibādihi yarzuqu man yashāu wahuwa al-qawiyu al-ʿazīzu
